(12799x19683+19171)/1024 mod 64 = 21. (12799x59049+58537)/2048 mod 32 = 0. (12799x59049+58537)/4096 mod 16 = 0. (12799x59049+58537)/8192 mod 8 = 0. (12799x59049+58537)/16384 mod 4 = 0.
